name: An Unfinished Life
tagline: A down on her luck woman, desperate to provide care for her daughter, moves in with her father in-law from whom she is estranged. Through time, they learn to forgive each other and heal old wounds.

name: Ski Patrol
tagline: A developer attempts to sabotage the safety record of a ski resort.

name: Nothing But Trouble
tagline: A businessman finds he and his friends the prisoners of a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

name: Wise Guys
tagline: Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose $250,000, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City and comedy follows.

name: MacGruber
tagline: Ex-special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his archenemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

name: Bébé's Kids
tagline: To impress his new girlfriend, a man agrees to look after her friend's kids, only to find that they are uncontrollably rambunctious.

name: Ghosts of Mars
tagline: A story of human colonists on Mars who must be rescued after becoming possessed by vengeful Martian ghosts.

name: Play It to the Bone
tagline: Two best friends and former middleweight contenders travel to Las Vegas to fight each other for the first time.

name: Whatever It Takes
tagline: Two Los Angeles cops go undercover to investigate the distribution of steroids to wrestlers and body builders.

name: Pushing Tin
tagline: A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.
George Orwell's novel of a totalitarian future society in which a man whose daily work is rewriting history tries to rebel by falling in love.

name: Sex Drive
tagline: A high school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

name: The Importance of Being Earnest
tagline: In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.

name: The Last Temptation of Christ
tagline: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

name: Something Wild
tagline: A free-spirited woman "kidnaps" a yuppie for a weekend of adventure. But the fun quickly takes a dangerous turn when her ex-convict husband shows up.

name: Death to Smoochy
tagline: Kids show host Rainbow Randolph is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the kid's TV business isn't all child's play.

name: Smoke
tagline: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

name: My Life as a Dog
tagline: A boy and his brother don't get along well. In order to let their ill mother rest, they're separated and sent each one with their relatives.

name: Twin Dragons
tagline: Two twins are separated at birth, one becoming a streetwise mechanic and the other an acclaimed classical concert conductor. Finally meeting in adulthood they each become mistaken for the other and entangled in each other's world.

name: The Man
tagline: Special Agent Derrick Vann is a man out to get the man who killed his partner but a case of mistaken identity leads him to Andy Fidler, a salesman with too many questions and a knack of getting in Vanns way.

name: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
tagline: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.

name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
tagline: In Venice Beach, naive Midwesterner JB bonds with local slacker KG and they form the rock band Tenacious D. Setting out to become the world's greatest band is no easy feat, so they set out to steal what could be the answer to their prayers -- a magical guitar pick housed in a rock-and-roll museum some 300 miles away.

name: Mr. Jones
tagline: The story about the relationship between a manic depressive man, Mr Jones, and the female doctor who takes more than a professional interest in his treatment.

name: Larger Than Life
tagline: A motivational speaker discovers that the inheritance his father left for him is in the form of an elephant.

name: Return to Paradise
tagline: Two friends must choose whether to help a third friend who was arrested in Malaysia for drug possession.

name: Shadow of the Vampire
tagline: The filming of Nosferatu is hampered by the fact that the star is taking his role far more seriously than what seems humanly possible.

name: Cry-Baby
tagline: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad-boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good-girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

name: All About My Mother
tagline: Young Esteban want to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by the mother Manuela.

name: Christopher Columbus: The Discovery
tagline: Genoese navigator overcomes intrigue in the court of King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella of Spain and gains financing for his expedition to the East Indies.

name: The Blob
tagline: A strange lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

name: The Cooler
tagline: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

name: Blue Steel
tagline: A female rookie in the police force engages in a cat and mouse game with a pistol wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.

name: Lucas
tagline: A socially inept fourteen year old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends -- Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love -- fall for each other.

name: Nick of Time
tagline: An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.

name: Firefox
tagline: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink

name: Nuts
tagline: A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.

name: DeepStar Six
tagline: At the bottom of the ocean, the DeepStar Six has just discovered a new and deadly alien menace.

name: Cadillac Records
tagline: Chronicles the rise of Chess Records and its recording artists.

name: Johnny English Reborn
tagline: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down the Chinese premier.

name: Before Midnight
tagline: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

name: Dirty Pretty Things
tagline: An illegal Nigerian immigrant discovers the unpalatable side of London life.

name: Bella
tagline: Sooner or later every one of us will face an irreversible moment that will change our lives forever. If it hasn't happened to you yet...it will. BELLA is a true love story about how one day in New York City changed three people forever.

name: More American Graffiti
tagline: College graduates deal with Vietnam and other issues of the late '60s.

name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
tagline: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

name: Hoot
tagline: A young man (Lerman) moves from Montana to Florida with his family, where he's compelled to engage in a fight to protect a population of endangered owls.

name: Delta Farce
tagline: Three bumbling Army reservists bound for Iraq are accidentally dropped at Mexican village besieged by hostile forces.

name: Sleepover
tagline: Four best friends, desperate to improve their social status, enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.

name: Connie and Carla
tagline: A mob mix-up in Chicago sends two chanteuses screaming for L.A., where they score a perfect gig: posing as drag queens on the dinner theater/cabaret circuit. Things get extra-weird when a guy falls for one of the girls.

name: The Painted Veil
tagline: A British medical doctor fights a cholera outbreak in a small Chinese village, while also being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

name: Mad Hot Ballroom
tagline: The students of several New York City elementary schools learn ballroom dancing and compete in a city wide dance competition.

name: Dhoom: 3
tagline: To avenge his father's death, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics turns thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago. Two cops from Mumbai are assigned to the case.

name: Woo
tagline: Gorgeous and extravert Woo meets insecure and straight-laced law clerk Tim at a blind date.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
tagline: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

name: The Meteor Man
tagline: A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.

name: Rooster Cogburn
tagline: Marshal Rooster Cogburn unwillingly teams up with Eula Goodnight to track down the killers of her father.

name: The Chase
tagline: Escaped convict, Jack Hammond takes a woman hostage and sets off for the Mexican border with the police hot on his tail.

name: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
tagline: The sole surviving Texas Ranger of an ambush arranged by Butch Cavandish returns to fight back as a masked hero.

name: Annie Get Your Gun
tagline: The story of the great sharpshooter, Annie Oakley, who rises to fame while dealing with her love/professional rival, Frank Butler.

name: The Greatest Story Ever Told
tagline: The life of Jesus Christ.

name: Pirate Radio
tagline: A period comedy about an illegal radio station in the North Sea in the 1960s.

name: Dazed and Confused
tagline: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.

name: My Giant
tagline: Billy Crystal plays a Hollywood agent who stumbles upon Max, a giant living in Romania, and tries to get him into the movies.

name: Punisher: War Zone
tagline: After hunting down and killing hundreds of violent criminals, Frank Castle, aka The Punisher, faces his most deadly foe yet: Jigsaw.

name: Runaway Train
tagline: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.

name: A Thousand Acres
tagline: "King Lear" set on a farm in Iowa.

name: Strange Days
tagline: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a police conspiracy in 1999 Los Angeles.

name: Arbitrage
tagline: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

name: Miracle at St. Anna
tagline: Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.

name: Blankman
tagline: A simpleton inventor becomes a superhero with a bulletproof costume and a low budget.

name: Teen Wolf Too
tagline: Todd Howard is a struggling teenager. Nothing seems to be going very well for him, until he turns into a wolf.

name: Serial Mom
tagline: A sweet mother takes a little too much at heart for the defence of her family.

name: City of Ember
tagline: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

name: The Ice Storm
tagline: 1973, suburban Connecticut: middle class families experimenting with casual sex, drink, etc., find their lives out of control.

name: Hoop Dreams
tagline: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

name: The Night Listener
tagline: In the midst of his crumbling relationship, a radio show host begins speaking to his biggest fan, a young boy, via the telephone. But when questions about the boy's identity come up, the host's life is thrown into chaos.

name: Dead Calm
tagline: A mass-murderer kidnaps and seduces a young woman after leaving her husband to die on the vessel whose crew he's just slaughtered.
